resources.string:
This app lets users configure a specific app to launch whenever the device is rebooted.

Requires SHIELD Experience:
- Enable 'Apps > Special app access > Display over other apps > Launch On Boot'.

Created by the Interactive Tv Lab.
Open sourced on GitHub.
This short guide will help you get started.
When you turn on your device, you can visit the launcher, or immediately open up the app you want.
It can be configured to open up any app, including playing Live TV right away
It\'s easy to get started. And you can turn it off at any time.
Launch Tv App / Live Channels on Boot?
